meanings.definition: Resembling a bat in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The creature had a batlike face with large ears and sharp teeth.
meanings.sent2: The cave was dark and damp, a perfect habitat for batlike creatures.
meanings.sent3: The batlike costume at the party was a hit, with wings and fangs included.
meanings.sent4: Her swift and silent movements were so batlike, it was almost eerie.
meanings.sent5: The shadow cast by the batlike figure on the wall made it seem larger than life.
